widhurapanditha jathakaya thula madhura (sanskrutha: mathura), ghata jathakaya thula kansa, dewagabbha (sanskrutha: dewika), upasagara hewath wasudewa, gowaddhana (sanskrutha: gowardhana), baladewa (balarama), saha kanha hewath kesawa (sanskrutha: krishna, keshawa) yana namayan hamuwe.[24][25]
